cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Energy and Commerce on July 21, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 550, Immunization Infrastructure Modernization Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 17 (Thursday, January 28, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. KUSTER:
H.R. 550.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1 of the United States
Constitution, the Taxing and Spending Clause: ``The Congress
shall have Power To lay and collect Taxes, Duties, Imposts
and Excises, to pay the Debts and provide for the common
Defense and general Welfare of the United States . . .''
[Page H251]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

title: Immunization Infrastructure Modernization Act of 2021
